casebody.data:
ROSENTHAL, Appellant, v. HUNT, Respondent. (Common Pleas of New York City and County, General Term. May 7, 1894.) Appeal" from ninth district court. Action by Julian Rosenthal against Peter Hunt.

Argued before BOOKSTAVER, BISCHOFF, and PRYOR, JJ.

Sampter & Fleischman, for appellant.

No opinion. Ordered that the judgment be reversed, and new trial ordered, with costs to appellant, to abide event.
